referral.hero_subtitle: Rewards begin with your connection. Share and earn instantly.
referral.step1_desc: Connect your wallet and copy your personal referral link to share.
referral.step2_desc: Your friends join the presale using your link. You start earning rewards.
referral.step3_desc: Earn up to 15% in USDT rewards based on your referral activity.
referral.progressive_subtitle: Earn more as you refer more. Reach up to 15% USDT in total rewards. Plus, get up to $2,000 back by inviting 10 friends.
referral.get_desc:
âœ… You must purchase at least $300 in presale

Once both conditions are met, you will receive up to $2,000 back based on your purchase amount.

referral.faq_q1: Q1. How do I generate my referral link?
referral.faq_a1: A. Connect your wallet. Your referral link will automatically appear based on your wallet address.
referral.faq_q2: Q2. What are the requirements to receive referral rewards?
referral.faq_a2: A. You must purchase at least $300 in the presale and refer 10 friends, each of whom must also purchase $300 or more.
referral.faq_q3: Q3. When and how are referral rewards paid?
referral.faq_a3: A. You can claim your rewards anytime. Rewards are paid in USDT the following day at 10PM (UTC-5).
referral.faq_q4: Q4. How much can I earn through referrals?
referral.faq_a4: A. You can earn up to 15% USDT in referral rewards. Plus, receive up to $2,000 of your own purchase back if you qualify.
referral.faq_q5: Q5. Is there a limit to how many people I can refer?
referral.faq_a5: A. There is no limit. The more people you refer, the more rewards you can earn.
referral.cta_desc: Start referring today and unlock your full rewards potential. Share your link and start earning now!

claim.hero_subtitle: Connect your wallet and claim your MVS tokens easily and securely.
claim.notice: * Claims are allowed once per day. Rewards are reflected after the qualifying date.
claim.mvs_notice: * You can only claim once. Make sure your wallet is connected and eligible.
claim.staking_notice: * Staking rewards can only be claimed after the lock period ends.
claim.faq_q1: How do I claim my MVS tokens?
claim.faq_a1: Connect your wallet, review your claimable amounts, and click the "Claim" button in each section.
claim.faq_q2: Why is my claim button disabled or not working?
claim.faq_a2: Make sure your wallet is connected and eligible to claim. Some claims are time-locked or restricted to once per day.
claim.faq_q3: Can I claim my tokens without connecting my wallet?
claim.faq_a3: No, you must connect a supported wallet to verify ownership before claiming.
claim.faq_q4: How often can I claim referral rewards?
claim.faq_a4: You can claim referral rewards once per day.
claim.faq_q5: What happens if I try to claim more than once a day?
claim.faq_a5: The system will reject your transaction. Please wait 24 hours between each claim.
claim.faq_q6: When will I receive staking rewards?
claim.faq_a6: Staking rewards become available after the selected staking period ends (e.g., 30, 60, 90 days).
claim.faq_q7: What is the lock-up period for staking rewards?
claim.faq_a7: Lock-up periods vary by your chosen plan. You cannot claim rewards before the lock ends.
claim.faq_q8: Can I change the wallet address for claiming tokens?
claim.faq_a8: No, tokens can only be claimed to the wallet used for the purchase or staking.
claim.faq_q9: My purchase doesnâ€™t show up. What should I do?
claim.faq_a9: Please check your wallet connection. If the issue persists, contact support with your transaction ID.
claim.faq_q10: Where can I see my referral link and referral stats?
claim.faq_a10: Your unique referral link and stats are shown in the Referral Rewards section after wallet connection.
claim.faq_q11: What does â€œAvailable / Locked / Claimedâ€ mean in status?
claim.faq_a11:
Available: Ready to claim
Locked: Not yet claimable
Claimed: Already successfully claimed
claim.faq_q12: Can I claim tokens from mobile browsers like MetaMask mobile?
claim.faq_a12: Yes, as long as your wallet is connected and Web3 is supported.
claim.faq_q13: What should I do if the claimed tokens donâ€™t arrive?
claim.faq_a13: Double-check your wallet address and network. If tokens still donâ€™t arrive, contact support with your claim details.
claim.faq_q14: Do I need to pay gas fees to claim MVS tokens?
claim.faq_a14: Yes, claiming tokens on blockchain requires a small amount of gas fee, typically paid in ETH or BNB depending on the network.
claim.cta_desc: The Mevers token presale is live. Buy MVS now and join the revolution.
